import React, {useState} from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' /* ----------------COMPONENTS------------------------ */ import PtopBar from './PtopBar' import CategoryProducts,{Repeater} from './CategoryProducts.js' import Filter from './Filter.js' /* -------------------------------------------------- */ const ProductArea = ({Data,Index, Amount}) =>{ console.log(Data, Index, Amount) const nums = [12,15,18] let txtJXS = [] const Repeater = () =>{ for(let i = 0 ; i < 3 ; i++){ let j = 0 txtJXS[i] = new Array() txtJXS[i][j] = new Array() Data.forEach((datos, index) => { if (index < nums[i]*(j+1) ){ let aux = index-(nums[i])*(j) txtJXS[i][j][aux] = (

{datos.name}
{datos.price}
) }else{ j++ txtJXS[i][j] = new Array() txtJXS[i][j][0]=(

{datos.name}
{datos.price}
) } }) } } Repeater() const showItems = {text:txtJXS[Amount][Index] } return(
) } const mapFunction = state => ({ Data : state.PAReducer.PADate, Index: state.PAGReducer.pagination, Amount: state.amountReducer.Amount }) export default connect(mapFunction)(ProductArea)
